acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These letters were given to the Library by Harry Heineman of Scituate, Massachusetts, on June 21, 1988.

processinfo.head: Funding Note
processinfo.p: Funded in part by a grant from the National Endowment for the Humanities

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of ca. twenty-five round robin letters, 1986-1990, sent out by persons across the country interested in the growth and hybridization of magnolias and containing news, tips, historical notes, and other miscellaneous information.
The round robin letters have been placed in an open-ended accession which will include copies of all future round robin letters sent to the Manuscripts Division.
